doc:
Hillary Wolf https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hillary_Wolf 0 Hillary Wolf Saba (born February 7, 1977) is an American former child actress and judoka. She is most notable for starring as the lead character Laura in the theatrical film Big Girls Don't Cry... They Get Even and for her role as Megan in the Home Alone series. She won the world judo championships for juniors in 1994, and represented the United States in judo at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. Hillary_Wolf_Saba ( born February_7_,_1977 ) is an_American_former_child_actress_and_judoka . She is most_notable for starring as the_lead_character_Laura in the_theatrical_film_Big_Girls Do n't_Cry ... They Get Even and for her_role as Megan in the_Home_Alone_series . She won the_world_judo_championships for juniors in 1994 , and represented the_United_States in judo at the_1996_Summer_Olympics and the_2000_Summer_Olympics .
